input.sentences: our vacation was amazing ! the resort was very nice and clean .
there were many trees and it was very green .
the beaches were not too crowded and the ocean was blue .
we walked barefoot on the beach for hours .
we just could n't get enough of the scenery and walked for most of the vacation .
output.sentences: I wanted a nice vacation, so I checked for a resort at the beach, or near the mountains.
I'm a nature girl and I love green trees and sandy beaches.
I prefer quiet, sunlit, blue beaches, over crowded boardwalks.
I have walked for hours on the sand, no one but me and the seagulls, and loved it.
I walked, fed the gulls, took pictures of the scenery and had an amazing time.
